title: Continue to support and enhance WPF in future versions of Visual Studio.
body: Not everyone wants their Line of Business applications to have an HTML5/JavaScript look and feel. WPF allows for limitless possibilities to create a visually appealing application. Yes, there is a learning curve, but it is mitigated by the ease with which you can customize the GUI to your heart's content. After all, if the Visual Studio developers chose to use WPF for Visual Studio, clearly it is a good solution to applications' UI needs.
